long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BONA LLAF is a browser extension designed to help users identify potential fake news in Albanian by analyzing specific words or phrases commonly found in misleading content. By highlighting these terms, it assists users in recognizing and verifying dubious information.



Key Features:

• Fake News Detection: Identifies words or phrases frequently associated with fake news, aiding users in spotting misleading content.

• Related Content Access: Provides access to articles containing the flagged terms, offering context and facilitating further investigation.

• User-Friendly Interface: Seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience, making fact-checking straightforward and efficient.



BONA LLAF is committed to user privacy, ensuring that your data is not collected, sold, or used beyond its core functionality.

Enhance your online vigilance by adding BONA LLAF to your browser today.
